name: Interests behind positions
summary: When they state a position, ask what problem it solves and negotiate the underlying interests.
goal: Create trade space by targeting needs rather than fixed demands.
counterparty_guidance: Share interests selectively; protect sensitive leverage points.
Ask for their interests and look for tradeable differences.
Do not abandon your position unless a concrete trade exists.
Use interests to widen options without conceding value.
